comments.author: TheEpicPig

comments.text:
when i was little i played a weird game, Which was like flash, You were a 
kid. Who was sleeping, Which wakes up. Sees some lights in his door, You go 
there. There's a bridge... You go on the bridge to get to the room where 
the lights come from, But suddenly the bridge falls, I had nightmares with 
that game. I don't remember anything more. But that. Also. I only remember 
one part where you Were sleeping, And there was a dude watching at you. 
Really creepy. It had like 4 sequels i think. They were all called the 
same, But had a "Part (number 1 to 4)" at the end of the name of the game.
it was an interactive game, Which you touched stuff and you interacted with 
it. If someone also played this game/know which game it is, Please link it 
to me.﻿

comments.text:
This video is Illuminati. Here's why. There are 11 words in this title. 
Now. Flip 11 upside down. Flip it right side up again. Now look at the 
channel name. 3 words. 11/3= 3.66666666667. There are 3 sets of 666 in this 
number. Now take an apple and throw it on the ground. Hard right? YES! IT 
IS! Now that apple is representing Apple INC. Its hard to break. Which is 
ironic because it's easy to make an I-phone game. The word irony has 5 
letters. 11 rounded to ten divided by 5 is 2. 3 +5= 8. Now forget 
everything after my first calculation. ITS PROVEN!﻿
